scripts.heroku-postbuild: if [ $CLIENT_ENV ]; then yarn run prod-frontend; elif [ $SERVER_ENV ]; then yarn run prod-backend; else echo no environment detected, please set CLIENT_ENV or SERVER_ENV; fi
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m Heroku && git push heroku main
scripts.deploy:client: heroku git:remote -a opentab-frontend && yarn run deploy
scripts.deploy:api: heroku git:remote -a opentab-backend && yarn run deploy
